title: Defending Christianity’s Central Claim | Unapologetic 73
itunes:title: Defending Christianity’s Central Claim | Unapologetic 73
description: Paul in 1 Corinthians 15 is clear that if the resurrection didn't happen, we worship in vain. Why is the resurrection so central, and can it be defended?
content:encoded: Paul in 1 Corinthians 15 is clear that if the resurrection didn't happen, we worship in vain. Why is the resurrection so central, and can it be defended?
